trans-unit.source: Represents the event or events to raise when a node in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control is selected.

When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> control is set to a value other than an empty string (""), clicking the node navigates to the specified URL.
If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property is set to an empty string, clicking the node causes a postback.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property determines the events to raise on the postback.
By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Select%2A> event is raised.
No events are raised if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property is set.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A> property is not rendered for a node with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property set to the None value.
Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded"></xref> event when a node is selected.
Raises no events when a node is selected.
Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged"></xref> event when a node is selected.

Raises both the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded"></xref> events when a node is selected.
